attributes.action: Make Greggs start selling the vegan steak bakes again.
attributes.additional_details:
Greggs is a much loved brand by many, and the fact they discontinue a vegan option limits how many people can really enjoy the brand. 
It is subtle discrimination from a well known British brand within society, which shouldn’t be tolerated.
attributes.background:
The government to make Greggs sell the vegan steak bakes again, by holding a debate in parliament. 
This is because, Greggs discontinuing the vegan steak bake is discriminating against background who aren’t able to eat the meat at Greggs.

rejection.details:
Petitions must call for a specific action that the UK Government or House of Commons is responsible for.

Decisions about what products to sell in Greggs venues are a matter for Greggs, not the Government or House of Commons.

As a result it is not possible for the Government or House of Commons to take the action you have requested.
